Class SearchRenderer

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          transbit.tbits.webapps.SearchRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class SearchRenderer
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

This servlet mostly does rendering of different views in search page.

renderSeverityList

public static java.lang.String renderSeverityList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sevList)
This method returns the given list of severities as Options in an HTML SELECT with Low, Medium, High, Critical at the top followed by the other severities.

Parameters:
sevList - List of Severities.
Returns:
HTML Options of these Severities.

renderStatusList

public static java.lang.String renderStatusList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> statList)
This method returns the given list of statuses as Options in an HTML SELECT with Open, Active, Suspended, Closed at the top followed by the other statuses.

Parameters:
statList - List of statuses.
Returns:
HTML Options of these statuses.

renderTextFilters

public static java.lang.String renderTextFilters(java.lang.String filter)
This method returns the HTML for rendering the Text Filters.

Parameters:
filter - Filter that should be selected.
Returns:
HTML for rendering text filters.

replaceTags

public static void replaceTags(DTagReplacer aDTagReplacer,
                               java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> aTagTable,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> aTagList)
This method replaces all the tags with their corresponding values reading them from the given table in the given HTML Parser object.

Parameters:
aDTagReplacer - Parser that holds the Html Content with tags.
aTagTable - Table with [tag, value object]
aTagList - List of tags to be replaced.

getAdvancedSearchData

public static java.lang.String getAdvancedSearchData(BusinessArea ba,
                                                     boolean isPrivate)
                                              throws DatabaseException
This method returns the information required by the advanced search builder in JavaScriptObjectNotation format.

Parameters:
ba - Business Area object.
isPrivate - Flag to specify if user have view on private.
Returns:
JSON object encapsulating the data need for Advanced search interface.
Throws:
DatabaseException

getTextFilter

public static java.lang.String getTextFilter(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest aRequest)
This method returns the Text Filter if present in the QueryString of the Http Request.

Parameters:
aRequest - HttpServletRequest Object.
Returns:
Filter if present. Empty otherwise.
